law.catch_line: Types of insurance that may be written by a reorganized company.
law.text: If the articles of incorporation of the reorganized company so specify, the company may write any sort of business permitted by law to life insurance companies on the mutual or stock plan, and may also write life, health and accident insurance on the industrial plan.
law.history: Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 6, effective September 1, 1950. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 681b-12.
